name: The Search for Kazuhira
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

J to interact/respawn/start game

K to use sword

N to fire gun

This is a short Zelda-like game I made for the Low Res Jam 2022! It is still pretty rough around the edges, particularly the text (it's hard to find a good low-res font on short notice) but I hope you enjoy it. 

Credits:

SFX: https://leohpaz.itch.io/minifantasy-dungeon-sfx-pack

Character and terrain: https://game-endeavor.itch.io/mystic-woods

Sword sprite: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Buildings: https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite

Music: https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music

All other assets by me

Shout out to Equinox for supporting this project  :)
